proof:
Proof. We have that whp $|E_K| \ge \frac{dn}{2} - 2ne^{-d/3}$ (by previous lemma) and $|E_C| \le \frac{dn}{2} + ne^{-d/3}$ (since $|E_C| \le |E_G| = \frac{nd}{2} + o(n)$). Thus
$$
\frac{|E_C|}{|E_K|} \le \frac{d/2 + e^{-d/3}}{d/2 - 2e^{-d/3}} = 1 + \frac{3e^{-d/3}}{d/2 - 2e^{-d/3}}.
$$
For all d large enough, $\frac{3}{d/2 - 2e^{-d/3}} \le 1$, hence giving that $|E_C|$ is at most $(1 + e^{-d/3})|E_K|$.
